price: 92. Wuxuu yidhi: Tolkayow! Ma reerkaan ka dhashay baa idin kala darajo roonaaday Alle? Oo ka yeelataan sida waxaad tuurtaan dhabarkiinna gadaashiis; hubaal Rabbigay waa koobaa waxa aad fashaan.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَرَهۡطِيٓ أَعَزُّ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱتَّخَذۡتُمُوهُ وَرَآءَكُمۡ ظِهۡرِيًّاۖ إِنَّ رَبِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ مُحِيطٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi arahṭī aʿazzu ʿalaykum mina al-lahi wa-ittakhadhtumūhu warāakum ẓih'riyyan inna rabbī bimā taʿmalūna muḥīṭun
